R Code for Deep Learning for Vision Systems Jarrett Byrnes 2021-01-27 This Project Introduction This is an attempt to translate Deep Learning for Vision Systems by Mohamed Elgendy into R code using the keras and tensorflow library in order for R users who are not familiar with python to run code from the book. Prerequisites to run this code To run the code in this bookdown, please install the following packages: install.packages("tidyverse") install.packages("keras") install.packages("tensorflow") I hope you find this usefu!
